text: The NACAC U18 Championships in Athletics is an bi-annual championships to athletes under-18 years of age in the year of competition held between the member associations of the North American, Central American and Caribbean Athletic Association (NACAC). The inaugural edition took place in 2019 in Queretaro, Mexico. == Editions== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size: 90%;" align="center" !style="background-color: #CCDDEE;"| !style="background-color: #CCDDEE;"| Year !style="background-color: #CCDDEE;"| City !style="background-color: #CCDDEE;"| Country !style="background-color: #CCDDEE;"| Date !style="background-color: #CCDDEE;"| Venue !style="background-color: #CCDDEE;"| No. of Events !style="background-color: #CCDDEE;"| No. of Athletes |- |bgcolor=DDEEFF| 1st||2019 || Querétaro || || July 5–7 || Parque Queretaro 2000 Stadium|| || |} ==Records== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; width: 95%;" |- !Event !Record !Athlete !Nationality !Date !Meet !Place !Ref |- |200 m |20.82 (+0.5 m/s) |Rajay Morris | |7 July 2019 |2019 Championships | Queretaro, Mexico | |- |400 m |46.36 |Luis Avilés | |6 July 2019 |2019 Championships | Queretaro, Mexico | |- |Long jump |7.56 m (+1.1 m/s) |Kavian Kerr | |5 July 2019 |2019 Championships | Queretaro, Mexico | |- |Shot put (5 kg) |20.96 m |Ralford Mullings | |6 July 2019 |2019 Championships | Queretaro, Mexico | |- |Discus throw (1,5 kg) |62.34 m |Ralford Mullings | |5 July 2019 |2019 Championships | Queretaro, Mexico | |- |10000 m walk (track) |43:09.45 |Cesar Cordova | |5/7 July 2019 |2019 Championships | Queretaro, Mexico | |} ===Women=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; width: 95%;" |- !Event !Record !Athlete !Nationality !Date !Meet !Place !Ref |- |100 m |11.11 (+1.5 m/s) |Briana Williams | |5 July 2019 |2019 Championships | Queretaro, Mexico | |- |5000 m walk (track) |23:45.69 |Sofia Ramos | |5/7 July 2019 |2019 Championships | Queretaro, Mexico | |} ==References== ==External links== *2019 NACAC U23 and U18 Championships in Ahtletics Results U18 Category:Under-18 athletics competitions Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2019 Category:Continental athletics championships Category:Biennial athletics competitions
title: NACAC U18 Championships in Athletics
